name: Tower Fan for Bedroom, 25ft/s Velocity, 90° Oscillating Tower Fan with Remote, 30dB Quiet, 6 Speeds, 4 Modes, 12H Timer & Child-Safe Design, 40-inch Cooling Fans for Home Living Room Office
short_description: 【Hurricane-Grade 25ft/s Airflow】Powered by a 1360 RPM hyper-speed motor, this 40-inch oscillating tower fan delivers 25ft/s storm-level wind velocity, refreshing rooms up to 300 sq. ft. in minutes. Its 90° wide-angle oscillation and laminar airflow technology ensure even cooling without harsh drafts, making this tower fan for bedroom, large living rooms, or open-plan offices a versatile floor fan solution.

【DeepSleep System】Designed as a quiet fan for bedroom, sleep modeautomatically reduces wind speed to level 1 (30dB noise – quieter than flipping pages) while maintaining gentle airflow. After 20 seconds of inactivity, the screen will automatically turn off, combined with a 12 hour timer function, completely eliminating light interference and guarding the deep sleep cycle.

【Customizable Comfort】Tailor your comfort with 4 modes (Normal/Natural/Sleep/Auto) and 6 adjustable speeds, from a gentle breeze for reading to turbo-cooling for workouts. Control this tower fan with remote control from 26ft away – perfect for bed or couch.

【Detachable Design, Easy to Clean】The tower fan’s removable rear grille and impeller simplify cleaning and ensure your air stays fresh—simply rinse under tap water for a dust-free refresh. The anti-dust ABS materials resist odors, ideal for allergy sufferers or pet owners.

【Space-Smart & Child-Safe Build】Child-safe narrow grilles (<5mm gaps) prevent finger access, paired with a polarized plug for accident-proof setup. Hidden carry handle + ultra-slim profile (A4 paper footprint) lets you reposition the lightweight tower fan for bedroom-to-living-room transitions instantly.

name: Dr. Prepare Tower Fan Oscillating Fan, Portable Desk Fan with 3-Speed Options, Dual Air Circulation, 110° Oscillation, 3 Timers, Personal Quiet Table Fan for Home Office Desktop Bedroom, 13 inch
short_description: 【Feel The Coolness】Features dual fans to maximize air movement and deliver strong airflow throughout the stuffy space in high summer. 3 speed options (high-medium-low) provide tailored cooling-off experience to beat the heat.

【110° Widespread Oscillation】A simple press on the “swing” button allows the tower fan to oscillate horizontally for 110 degrees, sweeping more areas in the room with smooth breeze for effective personal cooling.
【3 Auto-Off Timers】Comes with 3 timer options, including 2H, 4H, and 8H, to enable this desk fan to circulate muggy air at night for improved ventilation and lasting coolness at your bedside.
【Whisper-Quiet Cooling】Produces a right amount of white noises (less than 60db) even if the tower fan projects high-velocity airflow, bringing maximum comfort to you for a sound sleep.

【Energy-Efficient Choice】Equipped with a 16W high-performance motor to create a stream of powerful airflow, while using less energy than tower fans of other brands. For any questions or concerns about this desk fan, please feel free to contact with us.

Reach through carrying handle. Refer to the user manual for troubleshooting steps.

short_description: Blow Far and Wide: 38" Tower fan delivers refreshing air up to 24ft/s, covering every inch of your living space. Additionally, the standing fan can oscillate 90 degrees, guaranteeing equal distribution of cool air across the room

Easy to Assemble and Carry: Designed for effortless assembly, this oscillating fan eliminates the need for screws, instead featuring a secure snap-fit base attachment. The carry handle makes lightweight fan simple to pick up and move. Its slender, sturdy and bladeless design fits beautifully into your home

Personalize Summer Chill: This bladeless fan comes with 3 speed settings:L/M/H and distinct modes such as natural breeze simulation, sleep mode for undisturbed sleeping, and strong cool air for hot summer

Enjoy Quiet Sleep: With 45dB low noise, the display automatically turns off in 5 minutes, allowing you to rest in the bedroom all night without any interference. 7.5 Hour auto-off timer effectively avoids wastes power in night running. Equipped with a remote control, you can operate all functions while lying in bed, very convenient

name: PELONIS 30 Inch Oscillating Tower Fan with 3 Speed Settings and Auto-off Timer, Standing Fan PFT28A2BBB, Black, medium
short_description: 𝟑-𝐒𝐩𝐞𝐞𝐝 𝐒𝐞𝐭𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠𝐬 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐂𝐮𝐬𝐭𝐨𝐦𝐢𝐳𝐞𝐝 𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐭: Choose from low, medium, or high speeds to tailor the airflow to your needs. Whether you want a gentle breeze or powerful cooling, the Pelonis tower fan provides versatile comfort for any situation.

𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐚𝐜𝐭 𝐃𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐕𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐥𝐞 𝐔𝐬𝐞: With its slim, space-saving design (6.8"D x 7"W x 29.7"H) and lightweight build at just 7.16 pounds, PELONIS tower fan fits perfectly in small spaces like apartments, dorm rooms, or offices. The built-in handle makes it easy to move from room to room, offering cooling wherever you need it—whether at home, work, or even in a studio. Its compact size and light weight ensure effortless portability and convenience.

𝟗𝟎° 𝐖𝐢𝐝𝐞-𝐀𝐧𝐠𝐥𝐞 𝐎𝐬𝐜𝐢𝐥𝐥𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐄𝐧𝐡𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐞𝐝 𝐀𝐢𝐫𝐟𝐥𝐨𝐰: The 90° wide-angle oscillation distributes air evenly across the room, providing faster and more efficient cooling. Perfect for larger spaces, this feature ensures every corner of your room stays cool and comfortable.

𝟏𝟐𝟎-𝐌𝐢𝐧𝐮𝐭𝐞 𝐀𝐮𝐭𝐨-𝐎𝐟𝐟 𝐓𝐢𝐦𝐞𝐫 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐯𝐞𝐧𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐞:Set the timer in 20-minute increments up to 120 minutes for customized cooling. This feature is ideal for overnight use, ensuring you stay comfortable without needing to manually adjust the fan.

𝟏-𝐘𝐞𝐚𝐫 𝐖𝐚𝐫𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐭𝐲 & 𝐇𝐢𝐠𝐡-𝐐𝐮𝐚𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐲 𝐌𝐨𝐭𝐨𝐫 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐑𝐞𝐥𝐢𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐏𝐞𝐫𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐦𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐞:Pelonis stands behind the quality of our products. This tower fan is built with a durable, high-performance motor and backed by a 1-year manufacturer warranty, ensuring long-lasting reliability and peace of mind with your purchase.
product_description: The PELONIS 30" Tower Fan is designed to deliver powerful and customizable cooling for any space. With 3 speed settings (low, medium, high), you can easily adjust the airflow to suit your needs, whether you want a gentle breeze or a stronger gust. Its 90° wide-angle oscillation ensures even air distribution, cooling every corner of your room efficiently. The compact and space-saving design, complete with a built-in handle, makes it perfect for small spaces like apartments, dorm rooms, or offices, and allows for easy portability from room to room. Set the 120-minute auto-off timer for hassle-free, customized cooling overnight. Backed by a 1-year manufacturer warranty and built with a high-quality motor, this tower fan combines durability, performance, and peace of mind—making it the ideal choice for your home or office.

name: Tower Fan for Bedroom, 25ft/s High Velocity, 90° Oscillating Tower Fan with Remote, 30dB, 6 Speeds &4 Modes, Easy Clean Design, Child-Safe, Cooling Fan for Home Office Dorms
short_description: 【𝟒𝟎-𝐈𝐧𝐜𝐡 𝐇𝐞𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 & 𝟐𝟓𝐟𝐭/𝐬 𝐀𝐢𝐫𝐟𝐥𝐨𝐰】Engineered for large spaces requiring powerful circulation, this tower fan for bedroom and living rooms generates 25ft/s wind velocity - 30% stronger airflow than standard 36-inch fans. The 1360 RPM motor and 90° oscillating fan design ensure even cooling distribution from bedroom corners to sofa areas, making it the ultimate tower fan for 300 sq.ft spaces.

【𝟑𝟎𝐝𝐁 𝐐𝐮𝐢𝐞𝐭 𝐒𝐥𝐞𝐞𝐩 𝐌𝐨𝐝𝐞】Library-quiet operation for undisturbed rest. Designed as an ideal quiet tower fan, it reduces noise to 30dB in Sleep Mode – 20% quieter in noise output compared to average bedroom fans. Paired with a 20-second auto screen-off and 12-hour timer, it maintains airflow without light or sound disruptions.

【𝟒 𝐌𝐨𝐝𝐞𝐬 & 𝟔 𝐒𝐩𝐞𝐞𝐝𝐬 𝐂𝐮𝐬𝐭𝐨𝐦𝐢𝐳𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧】Precision control for personalized comfort: Modes: Normal/ Natural / Sleep / Auto. Speeds: 6 adjustable levels from gentle to intense, delivering personalized airflow for any scenario. 90° Oscillating fan coverage: 43% wider than stationary fixed fans.

【𝟑-𝐒𝐭𝐞𝐩 𝐓𝐨𝐨𝐥-𝐅𝐫𝐞𝐞 𝐂𝐥𝐞𝐚𝐧𝐢𝐧𝐠】Simplified maintenance for busy households. Remove dust effortlessly from your tower fan: 1. Detach rear grille, 2. Pull out impeller, 3. Wipe with cloth. Anti-stick blade coating prevents dust buildup, requiring 50% less cleaning than traditional fans for bedroom.

【𝟐𝟔𝐟𝐭 𝐄𝐱𝐭𝐞𝐧𝐝𝐞𝐝-𝐑𝐚𝐧𝐠𝐞 𝐑𝐞𝐦𝐨𝐭𝐞 𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐭𝐫𝐨𝐥】The ultimate tower fan with remote operates up to 26ft - 30% beyond standard models. Control 6 speeds & 4 modes from bed or couch, perfect for large bedroom layouts where other remotes fail.

name: LASKO Apex Tower Fans Oscillating Quiet 42" - 29 ft/s Airflow, 28 dB, 90° Oscillation, 12H Timer, Air Filter for Hair & Dust, Remote, Black, Floor Fans for Home Bedroom, RST200
short_description: POWERFUL COOLING: Experience powerful tower fan for bedroom cooling with wide 90° oscillation, delivering effective airflow from the tower fans that blow cold air across your room
QUIET & TRANQUIL OPERATION: Embrace peace with room fan that operate as quietly at 28 dB; these fans are ideal as quiet fans for bedroom use
AIR PURIFICATION: Our tower fan with a remote offers Carbon X Filtration, eliminating dust and odors while providing a breeze
INTELLIGENT DESIGN: The Lasko fan delivers comfort, using AIrsense to automatically adjust speeds
VERSATILE COOLING OPTIONS: With this oscillating fan with remote controls, choose from 6 speeds and 4 modes, including Sleep, to adjust cooling fan for room conditions to your preference
product_description: The Lasko 42" Apex Oscillating Tower Fan combines innovation and serenity. As a standing fan with remote control, it offers seamless operation, allowing you to effortlessly manage its features from across the room. Designed for bedrooms and other living spaces, this cooling fan creates an optimal environment for sleep. The bladeless design provides safety while delivering powerful airflow that rivals fans that feel like air conditioners, offering the cooling you crave. Experience wide-angle oscillation of 90 degrees with whisper-quiet performance, making it ideal for those seeking bedroom fans for cooling and sleep without disturbing noise. Its impressive 29 ft/s airflow velocity and cooling fans that blow cold air keeps your room evenly cooled. With 6 high-performance speeds and 4 unique wind modes, you can customize your comfort to match your needs. The fan’s Auto Mode intelligently adjusts speeds based on ambient temperature, offering precise cooling efficiency. The included carbon filtration system enhances air quality by eliminating dust, pet hair, and odors, making it a fan that does more than just circulate air. The remote control allows setting up to a 12-hour timer, conserving energy while you sleep. This oscillating tower fan, combined with EZGrip technology for effortless mobility, assures both convenience and performance. Trust in Lasko's blue plug technology and built-in safety features, including a child lock, providing peace of mind. Discover the Lasko Apex Tower Fan's blend of innovative design and reliability, making it a standout addition to any home.

name: Tower Fan for Bedroom, 80 Oscillating With Remote, 7.5H Timer, 3 Speeds, Standing Bladeless Cooling Fan for Room Office 32 Inch
short_description: Multiple Cooling Modes: The tower fan comes with 3 L/M/H air speeds, and 3 refresh sleep cool modes, so come and customize your personalized cooling needs! This tower fan cools rooms quickly at speeds of up to 24ft/s. With 70° wide oscillation, the oscillating fan blows cool air to all corners.

Safer and Quieter: The quiet fan has a bladeless design, which is not only safer to protect children, but quieter, without fan blades fluctuating nosies. Energy-saving auto-off timer can be set from 0.5 hours to 7.5 hours in 30-minute increments, perfect for night sleep use.

Touch and Remote Control: The cooling fan has a beautiful appearance, sturdy material, and a smooth and quality surface. There is a touch control screen on the top, you can control it very easily with just a light touch of your finger. At the same time, you can also remotely control it, the remote control distance can reach 20ft.

Easy Operation and Move: The remote control allows remote control of the bladless tower fan with all the same functions as the control panel. The standing fan is also equipped with a hidden handle, which not only allows the remote control to be placed in a compartment, but is also easily portable, fitting into living room, bedroom without taking up too much space.
Reliable Guarantee: With UL certification, floor fan is equipped with safety plugs to prevent damage to the fan from voltage overloads.
